thread.title: BRIEF-MagneGas Says Entered Into New Employment Agreement With Ermanno Santilli Who Will Continue To Serve As CEO, Receive Annual Salary Of $235,000

title: BRIEF-MagneGas Says Entered Into New Employment Agreement With Ermanno Santilli Who Will Continue To Serve As CEO, Receive Annual Salary Of $235,000
text: Market News March 16, 2018 / 10:43 AM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-MagneGas Says Entered Into New Employment Agreement With Ermanno Santilli Who Will Continue To Serve As CEO, Receive Annual Salary Of $235,000 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - MagneGas Corp: * MAGNEGAS - ENTERED INTO NEW EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT WITH ERMANNO SANTILLI WHO WILL CONTINUE TO SERVE AS CEO, RECEIVE ANNUAL SALARY OF $235,000 Source text: ( bit.ly/2phxrRj ) Further company coverage:
